category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 40 (Survey of Emotional Labor Status)
contents: Article 40 (Survey of Emotional Labor Status) ① The Chairman of the Board shall periodically conduct a survey of emotional labor status for all employees in order to analyze mental stress factors caused by emotional labor. Revised December 16, 2022, ② After analyzing the investigation results in Paragraph 1, the Chairman shall prepare and implement measures such as relieving mental stress.
